ISSUE.TITLE: Deleting a non-existing file returns a 500 internal server error
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I'm testing a seaweedfs setup with a cassandra filer. When I try to delete a non-existing resource, the filer API returns a 500 error code. I would expect a 404.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: S3: should return 204 on DELETE to nonexistent file fix https://github.com/chrislusf/seaweedfs/issues/1776

COMMIT.MESSAGE: filer: should return 204 on DELETE to nonexistent file related to https://github.com/chrislusf/seaweedfs/issues/1776 https://github.com/chrislusf/seaweedfs/issues/1160
